name: adoptme
description: - two scripts in the index file (react and react-dom), makes them behave as a global variable.  - React is an API part of a library, and react-dom is actual renderer on a DOM. - App function needs to be called. That's why we add renderer in script tags. - JSX is translated into the JS. Then React.createElement is called. - Components always has to return markup, the result of React.createElement.
